column1: gabil is a Khuzdul element only appearing the compound names Gabilgathol and Gabilān. As Gabilān is glossed as "great river"
column3: p. 336  and Gabilgathol is said to be have been translated into Belegost ("Great Fortress")
column7: infer that Gabil probably means "great".Helge Fauskanger
column8: "http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/khuzdul.htm Khuzdul: the secret tongue of the Dwarves" at http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion (accessed 22 July 2011)
